title: How should I read a book 20-30 pages per day? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can read 100–150 pages of a book per day, given that it holds my interest. For this, I ask people who read books to recommend some to me. Then, I just get lost in the magic. Reading is my hobby. Well, you can read 20–30 pages a day or even more than that if you really wanna read. You need to take out time for it and really be interested in it. You can explore about which geners you like and read the best in them. Hope it helps. If you need any recommendations, kindly revert. Don't forget to upvote. Happy reading!!
